StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateShippingPeriods]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgID int, @Month int, @FiscalYear int, @BeginDate date.me, @EndDate date.me, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM SHIPPING_PERIOD WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND MONTH_CODE = @Month) BEGIN UPDATE SHIPPING_PERIOD SET ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID, MONTH_CODE = @Month, FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear, BEGIN_DATE = @BeginDate, END_DATE = @EndDate, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND MONTH_CODE = @Month END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO SHIPPING_PERIOD (ORGANIZATION_ID, MONTH_CODE, FISCAL_YEAR, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@OrgID, @Month, @FiscalYear, @BeginDate, @EndDate, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
